snippet.title: Paperman: Adventure Delivered | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet Paperman and the team in an adventure to find the lost mail and defeat the greedy dragon. Explore colorful worlds, uncover secrets, and collect all golden letters in this 3D collectathon platformer!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/papermansteam
Visit our website for more information: https://bit.ly/MindscapePaperman

-

Subscribe and turn on notifications to get notified about the newest game releases for the PlayStation 4/5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PC! 🎮

-

Mindscape has been a publisher of a variety of different family-friendly games since 1991, such as RollerCoaster Tycoon, The Smurfs: Mission Vileaf, Kena: Bridge of Spirits. Recently we started our own game: Life in Willowdale: Farm Adventures.

Follow our social media channels for more information about the game:
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/mindscape.official/
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/MindscapeGames
Twitter : https://twitter.com/MindscapeGames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mindscapegames
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/mindscape
